data.title: Saibaba Studios Ltd.
data.text:
The media fraternity has grown by leaps and bounds over the years, and there are few organizations that have enjoyed the consistency in their creative endeavors and managed to be the integral part of the industry in introducing the best of the talents. Ever since its inception in 2006; Saibaba Studios has merited in this distinction.

Saibaba Studios is a multifaceted media company with interest in the television reality shows & fictions, upcoming talents, creative endeavors, and other growing aspects of the media industry. Saibaba Studios provides a confluence of cutting edge creativity, and best performance in all its work.

Saibaba Studios is working on TV shows in different languages simultaneously. As a team Saibaba Studios takes pride in satisfying and fulfilling the different verticals and set a new benchmark.

Saibaba Studios aims to integrate a world-class culture by providing training to the upcoming talent for world-class productions. Saibaba Studios enjoys a diversified growth model presenting a sound mix of exposure and a quality in all the segments.

While India is a country with an immensely large number of talented people, what is seen lacking are talents that are harnessed with a strong foundation and right set skills that makes them a complete artist.

While in the course of giving the audiences some legendary shows, Mr Gajendra Singh has also given a platform and worldwide recognition to various artists such as Sonu Nigam, Shreya Ghoshal, Annu Kapoor, Kunal Gajawala, Toshi-Sharib, Mohammad Irfan, Neeti Mohan, Shadab Faridi, Antara Mitra, Harshit Saxena, Harshdeep Kaur, Shekhar Ravjiani along with regional stars like Avdhoot Gupte, Vaishali Samant, Vijay Prakash, Kavita Seth, Kalpana Patowary, Malini Awasthi and many more.

For the first time in India, Mr. Gajendra Singh introduces a Music Academy that develops and nurtures aspiring singers to their highest potential and prepares them to face any test in the Global Music Industry and shine their individual creative talent. We call it SaReGaMa Music Academy- SMA.

SMA is a source of inspiration for musicians, singers, performers and practitioners of the entertainment business all over the world. It is an institute where the best of commercial practice will meet individual Talent. In short it will be a school, a stage, a platform, a launch pad, and a business enterprise for those who believe in the power of music.

With our modern facilities, best faculties and extensive connections within the music industry, “SaReGaMaPa Music Academy” offers music courses that develops aspiring singers and prepares them to face any test in Music Industry like Reality television auditions, playback singing or Live performance.

SMA understands how the music industry works today and has created an immerse and broad learning environment for students, which connects them directly with the industry.

An apt description for “Mr. Gajendra Singh” would be a ‘trend setter’, the Creator of Musical Reality shows in India, Talent Scout extraordinaire’ and a true visionary who revolutionized the Indian Cable TV scene. He is the PIONEER of Musical reality Shows on Indian television. Few of his popular & prominent shows have been Close-Up Antakshari, SaReGaMa and the recent popular “Music ka Maha Muqabala” and “Sur Kshetra”.

He grew with Zee TV and took Indian Television to an international level. He presented the television industry with a new definition of musical reality and enrolled himself in “Limca book of Records” for creating history by making the longest running musical reality show “Antakshari” on Indian Television diaspora for 10 continuous years. This was followed by ‘Sa Re Ga Ma’ another longest running show along with the strongly branded programs like “Cinestar’s ki Khoj” and “Lil’ Champs”. Courageous enough to step into south market he creating benchmark shows for bouquet of channels there having won several awards and simultaneously created fiction and non-fiction shows in Bengali and other regional tv channels with path-breaking television ratings on Mahuaa TV. Mr. Singh has been instrumental in Conceptualizing, Developing and Producing a number of hit Musical reality shows and fiction based television series.

He also founded his dream Music Academy “SA Re Ga Ma Pa Dha Ni SA” in year 2007 which gave a platform to many aspirants of music.
